page.title: 15INDUSTRIES AND BUSINESSES
page.content: THE FOLLOWING INDUSTRIES & BUSINESSES ARE TO BE FOUND IN ARMADALE: { DRUMMONDS:{TRANSPORT CONTRACTORS STEETLEY UTD REFRACTORIES:{FIREBRICKS ETNA BRICKWORKS:{BUILDING BRICKS N.B STEEL FOUNDRY:{STEEL D.KERR:{BUILDING CONTRACTORS LOTIAN GLAZING:{FRUITIERS ARMADALE TRAVEL:{TRAVEL AGENTS MARHEM SALES:{LICENCED GROCER MR.TOM ALLAN:{PHOTOGRAGHIC SERVICES TIP TO TOE:{HAIR & BEAUTY SALON HAIRDRESSERS IN ARMADALE ARE:{MILLBURN {& SHANKLANDS SALONS BUILDING SOCIETIES ARE:{ {WOOLWICH,NORWICH & THE ALLIANCE P.HARKNESS:{PAINTER & DECORATOR CON SMITH & SON:{CYCLE AND CAR. ANTHONY:CYCLE SALES & REPAIRS
